comments:
I am getting the following exception when disposing artifacEdits. After talking
to chuck came to know that is problem that was not reproachable before but was
seen occasionally when a shared edit model was disposed that had multiple
clients. I think my situation is also the same where I have the ejb resource
that is being updated with multiple operations being run per bean of the jar and
the artifacts edits being save per operation and dispose being called on each
operations. Steps to reproduce this exception have been emailed
